{{ja-kanjitab|だい|くん|い|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=たいくんい'|大|tr1=dai|t1=great, grand|勲位|tr2=kun'i|t2=order of merit}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{ja-accent-common|n|だ|いく|んい}}<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[da̠ikɯ̃ᵝi]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|だい-くんい|hhira=だいくんゐ}}

# an [[order]] of [[merit]] higher than [[first]] class in the Japanese honors system
#: This equates to the {{m|ja|大勲位菊花章|tr=Dai-kun'i Kikka Shō||[[w:Order of the Chrysanthemum|Supreme Order of the Chrysanthemum]]}}, of which there are two versions, both technically conferring the same honor:
#:* the {{m|ja|大勲位菊花章頸飾|tr=Dai-kun'i Kikka Shō Keishoku||Collar of the Supreme Order of the Chrysanthemum}}
#:* the {{m|ja|大勲位菊花大綬章|tr=Dai-kun'i Kikka Daiju Shō||Grand Cordon of the Supreme Order of the Chrysanthemum}}
#: Although both versions ostensibly belong to the same class, the Collar, awarded with the badge on a chain, has been awarded much less frequently. See [[w:Order of the Chrysanthemum|the Wikipedia article]] for details.

====Derived terms====
* {{ja-l|大勲位菊花章|だいくんいきっかしょう|Dai-kun'i Kikka Shō}}: Supreme Order of the Chrysanthemum
* {{ja-l|大勲位菊花章頸飾|だいくんいきっかしょうけいしょく|Dai-kun'i Kikka Shō Keishoku}}: Collar of the Supreme Order of the Chrysanthemum
* {{ja-l|大勲位菊花大綬章|だいくんいきっかだいじゅしょう|Dai-kun'i Kikka Daiju Shō}}: Grand Cordon of the Supreme Order of the Chrysanthemum
